law.catch_line: Supervision of referendum by Commissioner -- Expenses.
law.text: The manner, conduct and management of any referendum held under the provisions of KRS 247.850 to 247.865 shall be under the supervision and direction of the Commissioner of Agriculture, and any and all expenses in connection therewith shall be borne by the association conducting the referendum.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1980.
